column4: trying to run wow under wine on a nvidia 9600 GT. wow locks up the machine after a minute or so. Anyone know anything about this card and the driver support for it?
Hm i have it and run it ok...
hmmm
You have installed the Nvidia 3D driver?
I've installed the driver using envyng
I'm assuming thats what I need to do
what version of the driver are you running?
Ok, let me give you a line...
Add SET gxApi "OpenGL" in the Config.wtf file in your wow folder...
pretty sure I've done that but let me double check. I've made so many changes...
ah I had it in there but all lower case. is that going to make a difference?
Maybe im not sure... Then i use "wine /blabla/wow/Launcher.exe"
what version of the nvidia driver are you using
Let me check...
k lemme try this
Please let me know how it worked for you, you can pm me if you want to.
same results
What version of Ubuntu do you use?
Ok, i installed wine with "sudo apt-get install wine". Maybe you can try it to?
thats where I started. had this issues and the guys in #wineHQ had me install from source w/ a patch applied. But since it  didn't help I'll go back to the package
Ok, you need my assistance any more? ;)
